title: Bold Script - Tony Hawk's Big Spin
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012033im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bigspin_5900.png)

Can anyone ID the script in this logo for a Six Flags ride? I’ve seen this script before, but I just can’t name it.

Many thanks!

 [‹ type id for anette lenz poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012033/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46992 "Go to previous forum topic") [made in Belgium DESIGN BOOK ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012033/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46978 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BradB

comments.content: Tony Hawk’s seems to be set in Portago, Big Spin is Cream puff by Nick Curtis [http://desktoppub.about.com/library/fonts/hs/uc\_creampuff.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012033/http:/desktoppub.about.com/library/fonts/hs/uc_creampuff.htm)
... which is based on eclat. my bad.
